greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Xor-Moebius transform of A000203, the sum of divisors.
comment: Unique sequence satisfying SumXOR_{d divides n} a(d) = sigma(n) for all n > 0, where SumXOR is the analog of summation under the binary XOR operation. See A295901 for a list of some of the properties of Xor-Moebius transform.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
Rémy Sigrist, Scatterplot of the first 2^16 terms
program: (PARI) A296203(n) = { my(v=0); fordiv(n, d, if(issquarefree(n/d), v=bitxor(v, sigma(d)))); (v); } \\ after code in A295901.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 25 2017, from _Rémy Sigrist_'s "gallery of scatter plots" in A295901.
